TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPointCustomProperties extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

Docs.summary: Defines custom properties that are common to data points, series and empty points.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class defines custom properties such as colors, the use of background images, hatching, and so forth.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> class and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A> property are all derived from this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series series, bool pointProperties) cil managed

Docs.param: The series that the data point belongs to.
A flag that indicates whether this is a data point custom property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified series and custom properties flag.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string AxisLabel { get; set; }

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.KeywordsStringEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the text of the X-axis label for the data point, series or an empty point. This property is only used if a custom label has not been specified for the relevant object.
Docs.value: A value that represents the text of the X-axis label.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property sets the axis label for a data point, series or an empty point.
This property can only be set at run time for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object. If you set this property or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object, all of its data points will use this label.
If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.AxisLabel%2A> property is not set and a custom label has not been specified, an axis label will be generated automatically using the axis scale.
Empty point labels are set using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.EmptyPointStyle%2A> property.
